title: Growing Strawberries Treating Pests in your Strawberries

tasks.task: Pick ripe strawberries from a bed while managing pests.
subtasks: Harvest strawberries by hand, placing them into baskets.
Remove unripe strawberries (leaving them on the plant).
Deal with pests (sow bugs) by picking them before they damage the fruit.
Avoid overripe strawberries to prevent pest infestation.
Minimize fruit contact with the ground by gently pulling up strawberries.
Dispose of overripe strawberries by composting or allowing pests to consume them.
Ensure area is free of pesticides (maintaining organic standards).
Enjoy freshly picked strawberries immediately after harvesting.
